title: Ticket #3582: Reconnect Test after Schedd restarts
description:
Reconnect Test with Schedd

job_schedd_restart-check_reconnect.run

I started with job_schedd_restart-holdjobs-ok.run which had some jobs running prior to restarting the schedd and then checking job status. The test is run in a personal HTCondor. The jobs we start now run forever(well till I remove them once satisfied). So the real question was how to determine the reconnects.

We never established callbacks from Condor.pm to CondorTest.pm for userlog events 22, 23 and 24 (Job Disconnected, Job Reconnected and Reconnect Failed)

These events are now first class citizens with callbacks which can be registered.

At the moment ANY Reconnect Failed event will make test fail.

All three events are registered with a disconnects and reconnects counted but not compared. Its a good solid framework with 5 jobs disconnected when the schedd is restarted. I am open to discussion of the best way complete it.
